column1: Most of these are basically simple, involving sitting or lying down comfortably and focusing awareness on a pleasing thought ( ‘ Still and calm … still and calm’ or whatever ; or invent your own ) ; a soft ‘ nonsense sound’(a mantra ) that you repeat under your breath ; on the rise and fall of your chest as you breath ; or successively on different parts of the body, starting at the toes and working upwards.

column1: Add one phrase at a time : When listening to a text or story in the classroom, or to a public speech of some kind, you can mimic by " tracking ", which means that you mimic silently or under your breath a few syllables behind the speaker.
